title: How to Make Hawaiian Style Spanish Rice

steps.headline: Add the hamburger to a pan.
Cook the hamburger until near brown.
steps.description: When majority of it turns a brown color, drain any oil from the meat.

steps.headline: Place the pan back on the heat and add the onions to it.
Cook and stir both ingredients together until the onions are on the tender side.
Pour in both the tomato paste and sauce into the pan.
Remove the pan from the heat and pour the hamburger mixture over the cooked rice.

text: Add the hamburger to a pan.  Cook the hamburger until near brown. When majority of it turns a brown color, drain any oil from the meat. Place the pan back on the heat and add the onions to it. Season with salt and pepper. Cook and stir both ingredients together until the onions are on the tender side.  Pour in both the tomato paste and sauce into the pan.  Stir everything thoroughly.  Remove the pan from the heat and pour the hamburger mixture over the cooked rice.
